ruling: - If [[Nobleman of Extermination]] destroys a Trap Card, you and your opponent must briefly show each other your Decks to verify that all copies of the Trap Card have been removed.
- You can select a face-down monster equipped to [[Relinquished]].
- If the selected card is not face-down when [[Nobleman of Extermination]] resolves, the effect of [[Nobleman of Extermination]] disappears.
